attributes.action: Call for Independant Audit of the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to call for an independant audit of the BBC as a whole, and for the findings to be made public.
It is time the BBC (as a public body) is audited and made to answer for its decisions.
We, by having to pay the licence fee should have our views heard, and deserve to have this Independant Audit carried out.
